Question: Keysight Technologies CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Keysight Technologies

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Keysight will showcase solutions at CES 2024 designed to accelerate innovation in electric vehicle (EV) development, including emulation solutions to reduce risk, speed time-to-market, and ensure interoperability of EVs and charging stations.
- Use cases demonstrated at CES will include battery research and development (R&D) for building better batteries faster, maximizing power to the road with battery cell, pack, and battery management system (BMS) testing, ensuring EV charging conformance by validating all charging interfaces, and gigafactory optimization by maximizing battery test lab efficiency.
- Keysight will also participate in discussions about automated IoT security testing and a panel discussion on secured IoT world at CES 2024.
Summary_cn:
Keysight Technologies

2024年国际消费电子展（CES）产品亮点

- Keysight将在2024年CES展上展示解决方案，旨在加速电动汽车（EV）研发创新，包括仿真解决方案，减少风险，加快上市时间，并确保EV和充电站的互通性。
- 在CES展上展示的使用案例包括为更快构建更好的电池进行电池研发（R&D），通过电池单元、电池组和电池管理系统（BMS）测试最大限度地提高道路功率，通过验证所有充电接口确保EV充电符合标准，并通过最大化电池测试实验室效率优化超级工厂。
- Keysight还将参与讨论关于自动化物联网安全测试以及CES 2024年关于安全物联网世界的专题讨论。
